question: Complete this passage from Genesis 1:1: 'In the beginning God created...'

answers: You must not make for yourself a carved image
You must not take up the name of Jehovah your God in a worthless way
You must not have any other gods besides me

correct: You must not have any other gods besides me

question: Complete this verse from Psalm 23:1: 'Jehovah is my Shepherd...'
answers: He leads me beside still waters

correct: exercise justice, to cherish loyalty, and to walk in modesty with your God
